p.seg: Letter found on sheet of paper folded to make a specimen folder containing specimen MEL2352468. Letter addressed: Hr Apotheker Sonder, Wallstrasse [Pharmacist Sonder, Wallstrasse].
In Betreff des uns zuruckgesandte Hefts der
erlaube uns zu bemerken, dass ein Hr [Ferd] Műller aus Rostock bestellte, dieses Heft Ihnen zu senden. Fűr den Fall, dass Sie das Heft wieder zu erhalten wűnschen, sehen Ihrem Auftrage entgegen

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
In reference to the part of Plantae Preissianae
The final parts (nos 2,3) of Lehmann (1844-7), vol. 2? These parts were issued in August 1848 (see Stearn (1939)). M carried vol. 1 of Lehmann’s work with him to Australia in 1847. It seems likely that he would have left an order with the publisher in Hamburg, Sumptibus Meissneri, for a copy of the remainder of the work when it appeared, with instructions that this be sent to Sonder for forwarding to Australia; the present note suggests that the publisher sent the work to Sonder without explaining that it was for M. M certainly acquired a copy of the second volume at an early date; see M to W. Hooker, 18 October 1853.
sent back to us, permit us to remark that a Mr [Ferd] Műller from Rostock ordered this part to be sent to you. In case you wish to have this part again, we look forward to your order

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
